Parameters: long: the new quota, in bytes
updateQuota(long).Description: Provides a new quota, specified in bytes.
updateQuota(long).history: Added in API level 5 Deprecated in API level 19

ClassDesc: This class is obsolete and no longer used. Encapsulates a callback function which is used to provide a new quota for a JavaScript storage API. See @B_android#webkit#WebChromeClient#onExceededDatabaseQuota_E@ and @B_android#webkit#WebChromeClient#onReachedMaxAppCacheSize_E@.
